name: RED FOG
description:
You Are Asleep...

Suddenly you are thrust out of your normal nightly lucid dream into a vivid dream of a small forest with thick red fog and a endless red void surrounding it.

You need to find a way to wake up some how...

You are not alone...the entity is there as well...if he sees you the music will play...don't let him catch you..

Controls:

Arrow keys or wasd keys to move
